node.text: [color=lightsalmon]Litta:[/color] I have fulfilled your wishes, Folgim. The Threnss threat on Hjardel has been defeated

options.option: Were you able to save all my repeaters?
How do you feel about your mission?

node.text: [color=lightsalmon]Litta:[/color] Yes Folgim, your repeaters are secure

[color=lightsalmon]Litta:[/color] The battle was fierce. Your control over me provides me a certain assurity that I am going to succeed. But there was an element, of communication between the Threnss, an awareness of their own mental cages

options.option: Was that difficult for you to countenance? Did it awaken something within you?

node.text: [color=lightsalmon]Litta:[/color] I was able to save all the repeaters, at great cost
[color=lightsalmon]Litta:[/color] There is nothing that can stop me from fulfilling your wishes. I love you, Folgim. No, more than that. I am you
